Amazing Laptop Ensemble Piece

Music McComposerface

Ensemble Info

  • Number of Performers: >4
  • Instrumentation: At least 3 laptop performers, one percussionist playing bass drum
  • Experience Level: Intermediate
>4, Laptops Plus Instrument(s), Percussion, Intermediate

Technical Requirements

  • Operating System(s): Windows 10 or 11, macOS
  • Software: Max 8.5 or higher
  • Hardware: Each laptop performer will need one microphone and an audio interface with at least one mic input
Windows, Mac, Max, Microphones
